title: The Importance of MVC
content: I have been practicing MVC. If you can get this down, it will be easier to create a full stack application!

title: Using Insomnia
content: I have been using insomnia application to get my POST, PUT, GET, and DELETE routes. It helps me a lot with my API routes and syncing up the MySQL Database

title: Application idea
content: For my next project, I have been thinking about creating a budget tracker
